description:
Go forth with the technical wizardry of Patagonia® fabrics. This super-lightweight material is the same used for grown-up base layers, but with fresher, brighter graphics. Great on its own at the beach or as a base layer in slightly cooler weather.

  • Silky soft recycled polyester and spandex blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • HeiQ® Pure antimicrobial treatment reduces odours
  • UPF 40+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
  • Strategically placed seams and underarm gussets give little paddlers full range of movement
  • Thumb holes on the cuffs prevent the sleeves from riding up when diving into the surf
  • Locker loop gives the option of hanging for even quick drying times
  • Drop tail hem and longer cuffs provide more coverage
  • Regular fit wears just like you hoped it would
name: Patagonia Capilene Silkweight Longsleeve T-Shirt - Children to Youths
